version_description:
- New global servers open (日本 / Asia / Global)
- Premium Recruitment / Fatecore Chance Up Recruitment added
- Fatecore Fusion / Fatecore Succession / Core Sharing system added
- New Fatecore released: Dragon Emperor's Knights Rood (Zeon)
- Exclusive Weapon Purchase added
- Combat Power improved for story and content progression
- Various in-app purchase product improved

- "Core Memory" system added per theme
- Hero "Scout" system added
- Core Raid Pass added
- Bugs fixed and system convenience improved

- Season 2 new story The North Wind added
- Season 2 new nation Brunn added
- Season 2 Celebration Event added
- Account level cap increased to 60 from 55
- Nation hero enhancement system Signature Force added
- Nation hero recruit system Nation Recruit added
- Awaken Hero and Rank Equipment system added
- New individual decoration system Dye added
- Monthly season mission added
- Other bug fixes and convenience enhancement

- Season 2 new story The North Wind added
- Season 2 new nation Brunn added
- Season 2 Celebration Event added
- Account level cap increased to 60 from 55
- Nation hero enhancement system Signature Force added
- Nation hero recruit system Nation Recruit added
- Awaken Hero and Rank Equipment system added
- New individual decoration system Dye added
- Monthly season mission added
- Other bug fixes and convenience enhancement

- New story Chapter 12 added
- New Fatecore and Exclusive Weapons added
- New content "Infinity Core" added
- Content Shop added
- Hair Dye added
- New events applied

- New story Chapter 12 added
- New Fatecore and Exclusive Weapons added
- New content "Infinity Core" added
- Content Shop added
- Hair Dye added
- New events applied
